2.1.hd_quote: We are trying to find a way to avoid ugliness and disharmony.
2.1.behavioral_axis: Moves toward beauty and harmony aesthetically, finding direction that brings pleasure and avoids ugliness in life
2.1.shadow_axis: Asserts ego and willpower to control direction, ignoring inner wisdom and discovering it's disastrous each time
2.1.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

2.2.hd_quote: They are the direction. If you have the second gate, you are the direction.
2.2.behavioral_axis: Goes naturally in the right direction without knowing it, letting it flow out uninterfered because they don't know how to interfere with themselves
2.2.shadow_axis: Claims their direction comes from their own genius and hard work, pumping up ego and becoming a paper tiger
2.2.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

2.3.hd_quote: The teacher that never stops being a student.
2.3.behavioral_axis: Experiments with different fuels and directions through trial and error, breaking bonds and trying new paths until finding what works
2.3.shadow_axis: Either stubbornly stays with one direction refusing to change, or jumps rapidly from one to the next breaking bonds constantly
2.3.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

2.4.behavioral_axis: Keeps their direction secret in a one-tracked way, not telling others which way they're turning until they actually make the turn
2.4.shadow_axis: Lets ego announce their direction beforehand, blabbing about which way they're going and inviting interference that creates problems
2.4.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

2.5.hd_quote: Higher knowing as an exclusively individual and selfish process.
2.5.behavioral_axis: Manages resources from others who offer fuel, accepting their energy while maintaining control of where they drive
2.5.shadow_axis: Pushes everyone away refusing to share responsibility, keeping direction exclusively for themselves and refusing anyone else's input
2.5.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

2.6.hd_quote: Unable or unwilling to see the whole picture.
2.6.behavioral_axis: Sits on the roof with limited view of all possible roads, waiting for the right moment to come down from their perspective
2.6.shadow_axis: Gets fixed on mundane security and money-making, letting ego take over and blocking mutation entirely
2.6.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks
